chunk:
Meaningful Beauty Skin Softening Cleanser

Brand: Meaningful Beauty

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Propylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Laureth-8 Sulfate, Magnesium Laureth Sulfate, Magnesium Laureth-8 Sulfate, Sodium Oleth Sulfate, Magnesium Oleth Sulfate, Galactaric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
